update goods
GOODS_SN = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_IMG = #{goodsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_PRICE = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHOP_PRICE = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WARN_STOCK = #{warnStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_STOCK = #{goodsStock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_TIPS = #{goodsTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SALE = #{isSale,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_BEST = #{isBest,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT},
GOODS_CAT_ID_PATH = #{goodsCatIdPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_CAT_ID = #{goodsCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_DESC = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE_NUM = #{saleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SALE_TIME = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
